Guides Language Reference Package Index

Package

sockets

Initializers

🆕

Methods

🙋

Class 🏄

🏄 represents a socket that listens for clients on a given port.

Initializers

🆕

🔓 🐈 🆕 port 🚂

Creates a 🏄 instance that immediately starts listening on the given port. This initializer returns Nothingness if the socket can’t be bound to the given port.

Methods

🙋

🔓 🐖 🙋 ➡️ 🍬📞

Waits until a client wants to connect to this socket and returns a socket to communicate with it.
